text: Molly Kate Bernard (born April 10, 1988) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Lauren Heller on the television series Younger. Bernard was born in New York City. Bernard is openly lesbian. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:LGBT actors Category:Lesbians Category:Actors from New York City
title: Molly Bernard
